policy: GCP Kubernetes Engine Clusters web UI/Dashboard is set to Enabled
rule: $.resource[*].google_container_cluster exists and ($.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config does not exist or $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].kubernetes_dashboard does not exist or $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].kubernetes_dashboard[*] is empty or ($.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].kubernetes_dashboard[*] is not empty and $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].kubernetes_dashboard[*].disabled any equal false))
